Hey! I'm the server bot :D 
 
 I've got a few useful features that you can directly activate, such as: 
 !music - help for music functions 
 !lenny - deletes your message and sends a lenny face instead! 
  !kawaii - deletes your message and sends a cute face instead! 
 !acid - deletes your message and sends an ascii dude on acid! 
 !hug - deletes your message and sends a cute hugging bear instead :) 
 !gib - deletes your message and sends an emoji who just really wants something! 
 !confused - deletes your message and sends you a confused emoji! 
 !excite - deletes your message and sends you an excited emoji! 
 !lennywall - deletes your message and sends a lenny hiding behind a wall! 
 !happy - deletes your message and sends a happy emoji instead! 
 !comeback - stuck in an argument? ImpostorBot will give you a handy comeback :D

To use music features, make sure you're in a voice channel first! The available commands are: 
 `!play` - Play and queue songs 
 `!stop` - stop the current playback and get ImpostorBot to disconnect 
 `!pause` - pauses playback 
 `!resume` - resumes playback 
 `!queue` - shows the current queue in chat
You can find the code here: https://github.com/whoisEllie/ImpostorBot
